companyName: System Controls Ltd C4 Fergusons Way

partnerDetails.about:
System Controls Ltd. is a Northern Ireland based company working to serve a worldwide market in the controls industry. The company was established in a small unit in Ballymena in 2004 by Nigel Harris and John Clarke. Due to business growth and increasing staff, the company relocated to its larger facilities in Antrim, Co. Antrim in 2009 where we are well equipped to meet the needs and requirements of individual projects and solutions.
The services we provide include solutions for:
  • BMS (Building Management Systems)
  • Conventional Control Systems
  • OEM (Original Equipment Manufacture)
  • Control Panels and Switchboards
  • Equipment Calibration
In addition to our Company's commitment to quality, System Controls guarantee attention to detail and keeping up to date with new trends and technologies as well as operating in accordance with our accredited Quality Standard ISO9001:2008. The Company has also successfully attained SAFE-T-CERT accreditation. It is the unique combination of skills from all the range of services we provide along with our professionalism which enables System Controls to produce a ‘Best Fit’ solution for each project in its individual environment.

Our mission statement reads:
“Being dynamic is central in our approach to providing a high quality service; we aim to work with our clients not just for them”
